name: Momo (Joe Shanahan)
description:
Momo is a game about avoiding spikes, and collecting gems.
Tap once to jump. Tap while you're in the air to float even higher.

Collect enough gems to unlock more hearts, or more jumps, and see how far you can get!

Available on Android from the Google Play Store.

Actual Reviews (from actual people)

★★★★★ "The best gaming experience I've ever had. At least double as good as GTAVI" 

★★★★★ "Momo is a drug addict"

★★★★★ "Time pass"

 ★★★★⭐ "It's ok game" 

★★★⭐⭐ "All you do is jump the obstacles"

★★⭐⭐⭐ "I am the first person to give 2 stars..."
